page.title: 10Interesting Street Names
page.content: Although almost every house in the part of Annan, which falls into our area, was built during this century, there are several street names which have interesting links with local history. Overlooking the River Annan is the place called{Gala Bank}or {Galabank}. This got its name because in the 16th century, this was {Gallows Bank}where criminals were hanged. Nowadays, it belongs to the council. Some of the ground has been turned into a caravan park for holiday-makers, while the remainder is the home ground of the local soccer club,{Annan Athletic. They have built a new pavilion at the ground, but many hefty clearances end up in the river even though there is a high wire fence there. Sometimes our school football team gets the chance to play important matches there.
